domain_terms.SRE: Site Reliability Engineering - applying software engineering to operations
domain_terms.SLO: Service Level Objective - target level of service reliability
domain_terms.SLI: Service Level Indicator - quantitative measure of service level
domain_terms.Error Budget: Acceptable amount of downtime or errors based on SLO
domain_terms.Toil: Manual, repetitive operational work that can be automated
domain_terms.Observability: Ability to understand system internal state from external outputs
domain_terms.Incident Management: Process for responding to and resolving service disruptions

framework_description: SLOs, SLIs, observability, incident management, error budgets, and operational excellence
v2_domain_features:
- Replaced old simple sections with 11 comprehensive LASRE requirements
- LASRE1: SLO Definition (4 subsections, 8 data points)
- LASRE2: SLI Selection (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LASRE3: Error Budget Policy (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LASRE4: Observability (4 subsections, 8 data points)
- LASRE5: Monitoring & Alerting (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LASRE6: Incident Management (3 subsections, 6 data points)
- LASRE7: Capacity Planning (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LASRE8: Deployment Automation (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LASRE9: Runbook Documentation (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LASRE10: Toil Reduction (2 subsections, 4 data points)
- LASRE11: On-Call Process (2 subsections, 4 data points)
